entry.title: Friday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries or rain showers beginning this evening. Snowfall amount 2 cm inland and over higher terrain. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Friday 14 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High plus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High plus 5. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Friday 14 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 in the evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Friday 14 April 2023
